sentences.en: A few days later, Tara and Randy talk about their team project.
sentences.cn: 几天后, 塔拉和兰迪讨论他们的小组报告.

sentences.en: Could Kay's letters strengthen the case against Randy?
sentences.cn: 凯的信可以加强对兰迪的控诉 吗 ?

sentences.en: Hi, Randy! We need to talk about our project.
sentences.cn: 嗨, 兰迪! 我们得谈一下小组报告的事情.

sentences.en: It was extremely hot and I was feeling rather randy.
sentences.cn: 场面非常刺激撩人，我感到欲火难耐。

sentences.en: Randy : Let me get the coffee. I see the machines over there.
sentences.cn: 蓝迪: 我去买咖啡. 我看到那边有自动售货机.

sentences.en: Randy and l, we connected on this spiritual level.
sentences.cn: 兰迪和我, 我们在精神层次交流.

sentences.en: Randy earned his undergraduate degree in Computer Science at Brown in 1982.
sentences.cn: 兰迪在1982年获得了布莱恩大学的计算机科学的本科学位.

sentences.en: Randy Gardner decided not to sleep for 11 straight days in 1964.
sentences.cn: 兰迪-加德纳在1964年曾经决定连续11天不睡觉.

sentences.en: Randy is consoling his friend Steve , whose girlfriend has just left him.
sentences.cn: 朗迪正在安慰他的朋友史帝夫, 史帝夫的女友离开他了.

sentences.en: Randy is new to the blogosphere, and I'm afraid It'shows.
sentences.cn: 兰迪是博客界的新手, 这恐怕大家也看得出来.

sentences.en: Randy sets the standard for his style of relief pitching very high.
sentences.cn: 兰迪将自己的替补投球标准定得很高.

sentences.en: Randy: Hey, Stan, can I play with you guys?
sentences.cn: 屎蛋爸: 嘿, 屎蛋, 我能跟你们一起玩 吗 ?

sentences.en: Randy: Yes. I am wondering if you can help me a little bit.
sentences.cn: 蓝迪: 是的.不知道你能不能帮我一点小忙?

sentences.en: So to introduce Randy, his friend Steve Seabolt. Steve?
sentences.cn: 那, 由兰迪朋友史蒂夫.西伯特来作介绍. 史蒂夫?

sentences.en: The rascal is a randy man.
sentences.cn: 这个流氓是个好色之徒.

trans.tran_cn: 性欲冲动的，好色的，[苏格兰]喧闹的，粗俗的
